abstract: Wells Fargo’s chairman, Richard Kovacevich, is stepping down Jan. 1, handing the title over to current chief executive John Stumpf.
snippet: Wells Fargo’s chairman, Richard Kovacevich, is stepping down Jan. 1, handing the title over to current chief executive John Stumpf.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo‘s chairman, Richard Kovacevich, is stepping down on Jan. 1, handing the title over to the current chief executive, John Stumpf.
